simplified: 宁拆十座庙，不毁一桩婚

pronunciation.pinyin: níng chāi shí zuò miào , bù huì yī zhuāng hūn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ning2 chai1 shi2 zuo4 miao4 , bu4 hui4 yi1 zhuang1 hun1

details.simplified: 宁拆十座庙，不毁一桩婚
details.traditional: 寧拆十座廟，不毀一樁婚

meanings.value: rather destroy ten temples than a single marriage
